Madame Jacquot? . . . It's such an age ..." 
"You are mistaken," said Boris deliberately, with a bold and slightly sarcastic smile. "I am Boris, son of Princess Anna Mikh ylovna Dru- betskdya. Rost6v, the father, is Ilya, and his son is Nicholas. I never knew any Madame Jac- quot." 
Pierre shook his head and arms as if attacked by mosquitoes or bees.
